resources.string: Turn this on to enhance the battery life.
There are Apps consuming battery in the background.

Enable the Background activity manager to extend the battery life. While this is enabled, some app/email notifications may not be retrieved instantly. You can manage the battery life by adding Apps to or removing them from the whitelist.

Enable the Background activity manager to extend the battery life. While this is enabled, some app/email notifications may not be retrieved instantly. You can manage the battery life by adding Apps to or removing them from the blacklist.
Add all Apps to the whitelist
The notifications may not be retrieved instantly
